## Installation

You can install the development version of algatr from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("TheWangLab/algatr", build_vignettes = TRUE)
```

## Example

```{r, echo = FALSE}
devtools::load_all()
```

```{r example}
library(algatr)
load_example()
```

### MMRR
```{r, warning = FALSE, cache = TRUE, results = FALSE}
mmrr <- mmrr_do_everything(gendist, liz_coords, CA_env, model = "full")
```
```{r, echo = FALSE}
gt::as_raw_html(mmrr_table(mmrr$coeff_df))
```


### GDM
```{r, warning = FALSE, cache = TRUE, results = FALSE}
gdm <- gdm_do_everything(gendist, liz_coords, CA_env, model = "full", scale_gendist = TRUE)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
gt::as_raw_html(gdm_table(gdm$coeff_df))
```

### RDA
```{r, warning = FALSE, cache = TRUE, results = FALSE}
rda <- rda_do_everything(liz_vcf, CA_env, liz_coords)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
gt::as_raw_html(rda_table(rda$cor_df, top = TRUE, order = TRUE, nrow = 5))
```

### LFMM
```{r, warning = FALSE, cache = TRUE, results = FALSE}
lfmm <- lfmm_do_everything(liz_vcf, CA_env, liz_coords)
```

```{r, echo = FALSE}
gt::as_raw_html(lfmm_table(lfmm$cand_snps, top = TRUE, order = TRUE, nrow = 5))
```
